test_scenarios.name: Verify Website Loads Successfully
test_scenarios.expected_result: Website loads successfully with no errors. Header and Footer are visible.

test_scenarios.name: Submit a Form and Receive Confirmation
steps: Locate and interact with a general contact form (e.g., 'Contact Us')
Fill out the form with valid, minimal information (e.g., Name, Email, Message)
test_scenarios.expected_result: A confirmation message or a redirection to a 'Thank You' page is displayed, indicating successful form submission.
